db.sql: CREATE TABLE PAYMENT ( objid text PRIMARY KEY, state text, refno text, txndate text, paymenttype text, paymentamount numeric, paidby text, collectorid text, collectorname text, borrowerid text, borrowername text, loanappid text, appno text, detailid text, routecode text, isfirstbill numeric, longitude numeric, latitude numeric, trackerid text, cstype text, sessionid text )
